selectPersonas: Select at least two personas to start a debate.
briefDescriptionPlaceholder: A venture capitalist from Silicon Valley who thinks every problem can be solved with a new app and 'disruption'.
systemPromptPlaceholder: System prompt will be generated here...
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this persona?
errorCreatingPersona: Failed to create persona. Please try again.
errorUpdatingPersona: Failed to update persona. Please try again.
errorDeletingPersona: Failed to delete persona. Please try again.
chatRoomNamePlaceholder: e.g., Work Team Chat, Family Group
deleteChatRoomConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this chat room?
typeMessageHere: Type a message from someone else...
simulateMessageHint: Simulate someone sending you a message, and get AI-generated reply suggestions!
learnFromExamplesDesc: Provide 2-3 sample messages, AI will learn your style
exampleHint: Provide 2-3 messages that represent how YOU would typically respond in this chat room. AI will learn your tone, formality, and emoji usage.
exampleMessagePlaceholder: How would you respond in this chat room?
atLeastTwoExamples: Please provide at least 2 example messages.
errorLearningPersona: Failed to learn persona style. Please try again.
